short_summary: The contract is for the acquisition of treated wood for a marine structure (dock).
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2 PM EDT on October the 25TH, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The contract is for the acquisition of treated wood for a marine structure (dock).
full_summary:
### Tenders
### Treated Wood Purchase Opportunity 

| **Category (FR SJ)** | **Description (FR SJ)** |
| --- | --- |
| #1: UN/CEFACT CPC Id #  Un - Identifiant CPC d'UN/CEFACT #| UN/CEFACT CPC (J01)  | Teak wood | bois de teck|
| #2:UN/CEFACT CPCId#Un - Identifiant CPC d'UN/CEFACT # | UN/CEFACT CPC (J01)| Wood beam| poutre en bois | 
| #3:UN/CEFACTCPCId#Un - Identifiant CPC d'UN/CEFACT # | UN/CEFACT CPC(J01)  | framing lumber | bois de charpente|
| #4: UN/CEFACT CPC Id # Un - Identifiant CPC d'UN/CEFACT # | UN/CEFACT CPC(J01)| structural materials | matériels de structure| 

#### Enquire Opportunity

As part of an open tendering process, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has released an invitation for a treated wood purchase opportunity. The contract includes the procurement of various items such as Teak wood, Wood beams, Framing lumber and Structural materials.

**Contract Overview**
- **Contract Identifier**: WS3567882305-Doc3572434113
- **Reference**: WS3567882305; reference published on 4 October, 2022.
- **Amendment Number**: 1:  amendment to reference number  WS3567882305

**Procurement Schedule**
- Publication Date (date de publication) : 4th Oct 2022 
- Tender Closing Date (date limite de réception des offres) : 25th Oct 2022 (time : 2PM EDT), where subsequent submissions will be handled as non-responsive to our solicitation process.
- Expiration: As the dated elapsed bidding will expire by as of 25 Oct 2022.
- Contract start : could not determine.
- Contract end: contract end date Predetermined: 02 Nov 23.

**Bidding Process**

Any interested enterprises must submit their proposal with required supporting documents on or before closing date to avoid being rejected.

Prior to submitting their proposal, proposers must carefully examine the Invitation to Tender, as inclusion of insufficient or incorrect documentation may result in debarment of the business from bidding.

Contact :DHS on announcement.
